snippet: The Yankees will get more rest for banged-up or struggling position players entering their big series against the Blue Jays, but Joe Girardi could have more problems managing the bullpen.
abstract: New York Yankees manager Joe Girardi says rain delay of game against Toronto Blue Jays will give position players needed rest, but could mean overtaxing pitchers with scheduled doubleheader.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees will get more rest for banged-up or struggling position players entering their big series against the Blue Jays, but Joe Girardi could have more problems managing the bullpen.

headline.main: Girardi Sees Yanks’ Rainout as a Help and a Hindrance
headline.print_headline: Girardi Sees Yanks’ Rainout as a Help and a Hindrance
